name: Rygar
overview: Having just completed his great port of Bombjack (aka Bombjack: Beer Edition) in 2018, Graeme Gowie shifted his sights to one of Tecmo’s 1986 arcade releases – Rygar, a game never previously released on the Amiga platform. Rygar is a side-scrolling platform game that sees you take control of a dead warrior who has risen from his grave to rid the land of Argool from the evil King Ligar. To achieve his objective, Rygar will have to navigate through various landscapes battling 22 different types of enemies using his long chain with a shield attached to the end of it.  Along the way, you will collect various power-ups that enhance your attacking capabilities and ramping up your points score to obtain valuable extra lives.
